about_the_game:
🏞️ Explore stunning and diverse environments that unfold a story across 4 chapters, each set in unique biomes. In each chapter, take on four challenging missions, culminating in an epic showdown with a Big Boss.

  • Full Single Player campaign

  • 4 Biomes: Jungle Islands, Arctic, Desert and City

  • Day and Night Missions

🔧 Customize and upgrade your helicopter with advanced weapons, powerful shields, and experimental secret technology captured from the invaders.

🚁New helicopters will become available as the chapters progress. Collect Alien Artifacts to make upgrades that will transform your helicopter into a weapon with alien technology.

🌎As you progress through the game, new enemies and missions will emerge, gradually revealing why they came to this planet.

🎯 Master piloting skills to evade enemies and execute tactical maneuvers in battles against challenging bosses.

name: Alien Black Ops

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2.2Ghz+ with 6+ cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1660 6GB+ Or Radeon RX 590 6GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Black Ops is currently in development, and minimum specifications may change prior to release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2.6Ghz+ with 16+ cores
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX4070+ 12GB+ Or AMD Radeon RX7800+ 12GB+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Black Ops is currently in development, and minimum specifications may change prior to release.

short_description: This action-packed shooter puts you in control of an elite military pilot on a classified mission. After a secret operation to recover alien wreckage goes wrong, you must rescue downed soldiers and harness alien tech. Uncover their sinister plan and stop the invasion before it’s too late!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support
